name: Messy
tagline: Trying to identify a betting edge in soccer
body:
## Original Papers
[Bayesian hierarchical model for the prediction of football results] (http://www.statistica.it/gianluca/Research/BaioBlangiardo.pdf)

[A Hierarchical Bayesian Model of the Premier League] (http://danielweitzenfeld.github.io/passtheroc/blog/2014/10/28/bayes-premier-league/)

[Modelling Association Football Scores] (http://www.math.ku.dk/~rolf/teaching/thesis/DixonColes.pdf)

## Data
[Football Data] (http://www.football-data.co.uk/)

## Implementations of Models
[Model from Original Biao Blangiardo Paper](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/akhilketkar/am207-project-soccer/blob/master/biao_blangiardo_model.ipynb)

[Biao Blangiardo Model Modified by DW](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/akhilketkar/am207-project-soccer/blob/master/daniel_weitzenfeld_variation_bb_model.ipynb)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
